epd_metadata.third_party_verifier: Geoffrey Guest, Certified 3rd Party Verifier under the International EPD Program

product_description.declared_product: Concrete products produced by Holcim Nicaragua
product_description.product_scope: 149 concrete mixes manufactured at the Holcim El Salvador concrete facility in Acajutla, El Salvador

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules
lca_information.data_sources: ecoinvent v3.8 database and a local EPD database in combination with primary data from Holcim El Salvador
lca_information.data_quality_assessment: Precision, completeness, consistency, and representativeness are judged based on ISO 14044:2006 requirements.

transport_and_installation.product_transport_requirements: Diesel fuel used by the mixing trucks is direct primary information reported from Holcim El Salvador records for the year 2021.

end_of_life.end_of_life_stages: Not included in this LCA. Excluded stages include transportation of the manufactured material to the construction site; on-site construction processes and components; building (infrastructure) use and maintenance; and 'end-of-life' effects.

carbon_emission_context.environmental_indicators: TRACI impact categories were utilized as they provide a North American context for the mandatory category indicators to be included in the EPD.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_content: The amount of returned concrete is based on Holcim primary data for the reference year, 2021.

additional_info.regulated_substances: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
